summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 14th Avenue Northeast, from the north line of Sandall's Home Addition, to East 80th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers, all in accordance with Resolution No. 8559 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
